messages.message:
@sean.donohoe With a fresh sandbox (perhaps using the new baseimage) the services fail to build:

```make -s list-deps >> /home/owner/instabase/webserver/api-server/build/pydeps.txt
make[1]: python: No such file or directory
make[1]: *** [/home/owner/instabase/webserver/api-server/../../shared-utils/build-utils/shared/build-python.mk:85: list-deps] Error 127
make: *** [/home/owner/instabase/webserver/api-server/../../shared-utils/build-utils/shared/build-python.mk:113: copy-py-deps] Error 2
make: Leaving directory '/home/owner/instabase/webserver/api-server'```
I think we've tried a few iterations of `pyenv`, docker base image, etc. Not sure where it's at now, but can you take a look?
